name: A Night in the Floating World
description: An evening celebrating ukiyo (Japan's 'floating world') featuring live art, sound, and presence with transforming performances. Phones must be left at the door. Dress code: dark, elegant, experimental. All proceeds go to the artists shaping the evening.

name: Mayan Warrior x Looloo: Art Week Fundraiser
description: CDMX Art Week Fundraiser by Mayan Warrior and Looloo. 'A moment to reunite, to share our vision with the place that shaped it, and to celebrate the magic when our beloved community comes together through music & dancing.' Expect VERY SPECIAL guests.

name: Giegling in Mexico City: Art Week Special
description: The legendary Giegling collective returns to CDMX for Art Week. Featuring Map.ache, Leafar Legov, Edward, Thomas Melchior b2b Lawrence (all live), Vlada b2b Yamour, Konstantin, Celice, and more. Afterparty with Rhadoo, O.bee & Tomas Station.

name: Conversations & Tequila: Art Week VIP Salon
description: Exclusive invitation-only salon at the intersection of art, culture, and influence. Hosted by Art Asset Class and Marva Art Advisory, bringing together collectors, artists, patrons, entrepreneurs, and cultural leaders. Includes luxury gift bag and priority invitations to VIP experiences.

name: Looloo Art Week Sessions
description: Art Week programming at Looloo, Mexico City's premier electronic music venue. Known for its immersive atmosphere, cutting-edge Funktion-One sound system, and hosting world-class talent like Black Coffee, Damian Lazarus, and Marco Carola.

name: Fünk: Art Week Underground
description: Art Week party at Fünk, hidden beneath a historic Condesa building once owned by Cantinflas. Powerful Funktion-One system, immersive lighting, celebrating queer and trans ravers. Deep house and techno all night.

name: Japan Monterrey: Art Week Nights
description: Art Week at Japan Monterrey, spanning three floors in Roma Norte with dimly lit, eclectic spaces. Part dive bar, part club, entirely about the vibe. A magnet for the city's creative crowd with unpredictable programming.

name: Departamento: Art Week Rooftop
description: Art Week programming at Departamento, combining live music, DJ sets, and a rooftop terrace. A long-standing favorite and meeting point for artists, ravers, and locals who want a solid night without pretense.

name: Brutal: Art Week Techno
description: Art Week techno night at Brutal, the warehouse club from the team behind Pervert. Raw, industrial space in Cuauhtémoc celebrating freedom, expression, and intensity. LGBTQIA+ venue championing inclusivity.

name: [sic] Community Club: Art Week
description: Art Week at [sic] Community Club, created in 2021 to give Mexico City's dancers and artists a permanent home. The Juárez club channels warmth and inclusivity across three rooms.
